GK19gu01-03u:689: dhūlīnāṃ pālir itthaṃ kramam anu nimiṣa-projjhitaṃ vīikṣyamāṇā |
GK19gu01-03u:690: pratyāvṛttau nirāśā vraja-yuvati-tatiḥ prāṇam atyakṣyad eṣa
GK19gu01-03u:691: prāk cen nātmāgati-svīkṛti-kṛti-lipibhiḥ satyam atra vyadhāsyat ||GC_2,3.18||
GK19gu01-03u:696: [21] tatra tasya tāsāṃ ca sa-sveda-jala-kuṅkuma-rāgeṇa sāśru-kajjala-bhāgena ca muhur mitho likhitā dūtya-saṅgata-madhumaṅgala-patrikāḥ patrikā yathā-
GK19gu01-03u:697: āyāsyāmy āśu hatvā tam adhi-madhupuraṃ kaṃsam apy asti dūraṃ
GK19gu01-03u:698: vatsādy-āghāta-dhāmnaḥ puram api kim adas tat priyāḥ kutra duḥkham?
GK19gu01-03u:699: kintv anyat prārthitaṃ yad bhavadbhir ucitaṃ tad vidhatta prasattyā
GK19gu01-03u:700: prāṇe prāṇeśvarībhir mayi kim ayi paraṃ hanta mantavyam antaḥ ||GC_2,3.20||
GK19gu01-03u:701: gacchan neṣa tvam adya sphurasi dayita bhoḥ kaṃsa-ghātaṃ vidhāya
GK19gu01-03u:702: svīkartuṃ rājatāṃ tat katham atha bhavatād āgatis te vrajāya?
GK19gu01-03u:703: tasmād asmābhir arthyaṃ tad idam iha bhavāṃs tatra nānā-virājat-
GK19gu01-03u:704: tīrthe sarvārthade naḥ smṛtim anu dadatām añjalīnāṃ trayāṇi ||GC_2,3.21||
GK19gu01-03u:705: nālaṃ me rājya-lipsā katham api valate nirmame tatra satyaṃ
GK19gu01-03u:706: kaṃsaṃ hatvā yadūnāṃ sukham abhivalayann asmi cāyāta-kalpaḥ |
GK19gu01-03u:707: baddhaḥ syāt kṛṣṇa-sāraḥ sapadi vidhi-vaśāt tarhi kiṃ pārthivāder
GK19gu01-03u:708: mānas tasmin sukhāya prabhavati na vanaṃ nāpi kāntā-susaṅgaḥ ||GC_2,3.22||
GK19gu01-03u:709: vṛndaṃ krīḍā-vanānāṃ bahu-vidham abhito'py asti tatrātha rājñāṃ
GK19gu01-03u:710: kanyā bahvyo'pi kāntās tava vibhava-vaśād udbhaviṣyanti dhanyāḥ |
GK19gu01-03u:711: tat-tal-lābhe manas te katham iha bhavitāsmāsu vā kiṃ tapobhir
GK19gu01-03u:712: labdhe bhoge vicitre punar api tanum ānīhate vanya-vṛttīḥ ||GC_2,3.23||
GK19gu01-03u:713: satyaṃ tāḥ keli-vanyā vidadhati laṣitaṃ sarvataḥ satyam eva
GK19gu01-03u:715: satyaṃ kurve trilokī mama na hi ratidā nāpi tatrastha-rāmā
GK19gu01-03u:716: yadvad vṛndāvanaṃ me tad-anugata-ramā yadvad etā bhavatyaḥ ||GC_2,3.24||
GK19gu01-03u:717: sā te sarvāṅga-śobhā bata samadhigatā yena netreṇa yena
GK19gu01-03u:718: śrotreṇāśrāvi vaṃśī samagami vapuṣā yena ca sparṣa-lakṣmīḥ |
GK19gu01-03u:719: tenaivālakṣi dūraṃ gamanam avagataṃ tena sandiṣṭam ugraṃ
GK19gu01-03u:720: tena svaṃ vipralabdhaṃ racitam iti hahā jīvitaṃ dhig vidhiṃ dhik ||GC_2,3.25||
GK19gu01-03u:721: yeyaṃ dṛṣṭir mayā vaś chavi-parikalanāt kṛṣyate yā śrutir vāg
GK19gu01-03u:722: dūrasthā racyate yā tanur api milanād davyate sa-vyapekṣam |
GK19gu01-03u:723: yady etās tatra tatra pratikṛti-kṛtaye na hy adhīnā mama syus
GK19gu01-03u:724: tarhy etāḥ svairiṇīr vā katham aham ahaha prāṇa-sakhyaḥ saheya? ||GC_2,3.26||
GK19gu01-03u:726: yasyām asyāṃ daśāyāṃ sarabha-samagamat tatra kānyasya vārtā?
GK19gu01-03u:727: asmaj jīvo'py ajīva-sthitim iha niyataṃ prāpnuyād evam atra
GK19gu01-03u:728: svāmin na vyādhivat tat-pratividhir udiyāt kāla-kalpe vilambe ||GC_2,3.27||
GK19gu01-03u:729: āyāsyāmy eva śīghraṃ na khalu mama manasy anya-vārtāsti kācit
GK19gu01-03u:730: kācid vā daivataḥ syāt tad api na bhavatī-jātu dīnās tyajāni |
GK19gu01-03u:731: yā yā madhye mad-āptir muhur iha bhavitā tāṃ punaḥ svapna-rūpāṃ
GK19gu01-03u:732: mā śaṅkadhvaṃ yathā prāg asati ca virahe śaṅkamānā babhūva ||GC_2,3.28|| iti |
GK19gu01-03u:734: rādhāyā mūkatānūkam amitaṃ yat tu nirmame ||GC_2,3.29||
GK19gu01-03u:739: [22] tad evaṃ snigdhakaṇthasya kathitam anu vyathita-manasi śrī-rādhikādi-sadasi
GK19gu01-03u:741: rādhe śravasi nāveśaṃ kuru kintu vilocane |
GK19gu01-03u:742: vṛttaṃ san manyase hanta vartamānaṃ na vīkṣase ||GC_2,3.31||
GK19gu01-03u:743: [23] tad etan niśamya ramyaṃ tan-mukhaṃ niśāmya śāmyat-pīḍā sa-vrīḍā tat-kāla-
GK19gu01-03u:746: [24] atha sarveṣāṃ sukha-sandohe saṃbhṛta-dohe sarve parveva labhamānā nija-nijālayaṃ sambabhūvuḥ |
